boat.name: Mariette
boat.full_description:
Built initially as Bermudan sloop with alloy spars and ss lifelines etc., Mr Reeves purchased her around 2000 and converted her to a gaff cutter.

All deck fittings were changed to gunmetal. He added a new engine, spars and sails in 2002. Spars by Adrian Riva, sail plan and sails by Lawrence rigging by TS Rigging. Much improved electronics were installed, 2002.
boat.construction_details:
Clinker iroko on oak frames
Bilge keels fitted 2014 plate and case removed
boat.short_description: Converted to gaff cutter from Bermudan sloop in 2000. She has had her plate removed and full size iroko bilge keels have been added by Robertsons of Woodbridge plus other works by them. The plate case was filled with lead and iron to compensate for the loss of plate weight.
